tool.name: XML4Blast2GO
tool.description: , convert XML format for Blast to GO
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Program encapsulated in Galaxy and developed by Southgreen**
.. class:: infomark
**XML4BLAST2GO version 1.0, 2011**
-----
========== Authors: ==========
**Marilyne Summo** **Xavier Argout**
-----
============ Hacked by: ============
**Marilyne Summo**
-----
=========== Overview: ===========
Modify the XML BLAST output in order to be compliant for BLAST2GO. Modifications are minor, and concern the iteration query IDs. Iteration_query-ID takes the same value as Iteration_query-def.
-----
.. class:: warningmark
**No support website**
